ch0070_09_elitef/2701_0701_01_10:
We claim this Pokémon Center in the name of
Team Break!
ch0070_09_elitef/2701_0701_02_10:
The others said something like that when we took
over, right? Wasn’t that so cool? I bet it was so
awesome to get to say that!
ch0070_09_elitef/2701_0701_03_10:
I wanted to be the one to do it, but I lost in rock
paper scissors. Can you imagine how sad I was?
